description: This file provides utility functions for performing HTTP GET requests with retry logic, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, using the httpx library.

methods.name: fetch_with_retry
methods.description: Performs a synchronous HTTP GET request with retry logic, handling request errors and HTTP status errors.

methods.name: async_fetch_with_retry
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous HTTP GET request with retry logic, supporting optional custom httpx.AsyncClient and proxy.
